public void validateNonStaticFieldPointcut(Validate validateAnnot,
                                           java.lang.Object newValue,
                                           java.lang.Object instance)
Pointcut for the assignment of a non-static fields annotated with the Validate. 
 AspectJ pointcut:
 set(@com.google.code.aoplib4j.aspectj.fieldvalidation.Validate * *.*)
  && @annotation(validateAnnot) 
  && args(newValue) 
  && this(instance)

Parameters:
validateAnnot - the field Validate annotation.
newValue - the new value to be assigned to the field.
instance - the instance on which the intercepted field is present.

fieldIsStatic

private boolean fieldIsStatic(java.lang.Object instance)
If the aspect is called on a static field the instance reference is null.

Parameters:
instance - the instance on which the aspect is executing.
Returns:
true if the aspect is not executed on a instance object.
